alert.note: Alert for Columbia; Montour; Northumberland; Schuylkill (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued April 30 at 7:20PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 930 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of central Pennsylvania, including the following counties, Columbia, Montour, Northumberland and Schuylkill. * WHEN...Until 930 PM EDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 716 PM EDT, Trained weather spotters reported heavy rain in the advisory area. Fishing Creek is near bankfull. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. Additional rainfall is likely through the evening. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Bloomsburg, Pottsville, Berwick, Shamokin, Tamaqua, Mount Carmel, Schuylkill Haven, Shenandoah, Danville, Minersville, Mahanoy City, Frackville, St. Clair, Kulpmont, Ashland, Orwigsburg, Valley View, Mcadoo, Elysburg and Pine Grove. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
